entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain mixed with snow this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
